players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana, that's a bold lie. I investigated Bob last night and he's the detective. You're the mafioso trying to frame me."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. Bob, trust me and vote Charlie with me."
Charlie: "Diana is clearly lying. I investigated Bob and he's the detective. She's the mafioso trying to mislead us. Bob, vote Diana with me."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
